content: Read and analyze local CSS file (wiki-integration.css) structure and rules
Parse both CSS files to extract selectors and properties for comparison
Identify selectors that exist in local CSS but NOT in reference (extra 214+ rules)
Identify selectors with different properties between local and reference CSS
Identify selectors missing from local CSS that exist in reference
Analyze patterns in extra rules to determine their origin and categorize issues
Generate comprehensive report with examples and recommendations
